location.description: A 3 letter IATA code that identifies where this other reservation will occur.

traveler_ids.description: Traveler identifiers to indicate the travelers to whom this reservation applies.

status.description: An enumeration to represent the reservation status for this hotel reservation. For example: CONFIRMED, CANCELLED, REQUESTED, REJECTED, PENDING_CANCELLATION, PENDING_CONFIRMATION.

end_date.description: The date on which this rate ends, in ISO 8601 date format yyyy-MM-dd.

price.description: Total amount in the given currency per day of this rate, formatted appropriately. For example: 194.99.

start_date.description: The start date of this rate, in ISO 8601 date format yyyy-MM-dd.

geoname_id.description: The Geonames ID of the location that was searched for

name.description: The name of the location that was searched for

total_points_of_interest.description: The total number of points_of_interest that YapQ has indexed for this city

description.description: A paragraph describing this point of interest

short_description.description: A summary of the given point

wiki_page_link.description: A link to this point of interest"s wikipedia page

categories.description: Array of descriptions indicating what type of point of interest this is. You can filter the results to include only certain categories of point of interest using the category input parameter.

contextual_images.description: Images taken at this point of interest. Note that these images might have nothing to do with the point itself, particularly if you have enabled the social_media parameter

geoname_id.description: The GeonamesID of this point of interest, if available

city_grade.description: The ranking of this point of interest compared to other points in this city. 1 is the highest rated.

yapq_grade.description: Main YAPQ grade. A grade out of 5 for this point, rated against all points in the world and normalized among selected group of points. 5 is best, 0 is worst.

main_image.description: A link to an image of the given location

title.description: Display name of a given point of interest

walk_time.description: Time in minutes that it takes to walk from the searched coordinates to this Point of Interest

destination_station_id.description: ID of the destination rail station.

services.description: An array of departure times at which trains depart from the origin station to this destination station. Times are in the ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm format.

label.description: The full name of the station, in UTF-8 format.

value.description: The unique identifier of the station. You can use this as an input parameter for a rail search.

country.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code in which this station can be found.

id.description: The ID of this station, as provided in the request

short_name.description: The shortened name of this station (20 characters max) which may be used in certain cases.

traffic.description: An indication of the level of Intercity traffic passing through this station.

type.description: The type of code to which this station refers. Some codes represent agglomeration of multiple stations, whereas others represent an individual station. Possible values are AGGLOMERATION and STATION.

price.description: The long name of the provider corresponding to the above code.

type.description: The type or applicability period of rate being applied. For example: DAILY, WEEKLY, WEEKEND.

hotels.description: The hotel room bookings in this reservation.

others.description: Free text information to represent other travel items that may be considered part of the travel itinerary in this reservation.

unticketed_flights.description: The flight itineraries in this reservation that have not yet been ticketed or priced.

rate_code.description: The unique identifier of this rate.

rate_name.description: The name used by the company to describe this rate.

restrictions.description: An enumeration of the type of restrictions associated with this rate.

RoomInfo.description: More detailed structured information about the room.

bed_type.description: The type of bed or beds in the room, such as Double, or King.

number_of_beds.description: The number of beds in the room. May be an integer or a free-text dessciption, as provided by the hotel

room_type.description: Free-text indicating the type of room - such Smoking, No Smoking, Suite, etc..

station_name.description: Full name of this rail station.

period.description: The date period, in ISO 8601 date format YYYY-MM or YYYY

destination.description: The IATA code of the city or airport to which the traveler may go, from the provided origin

flights.description: Number of flights from origin to destination during the search period provided. This field is deprecated.

travelers.description: Number of passengers from origin to destination during the search period provided

period.description: The date period, in ISO 8601 date format YYYY-MM or YYYY

destination.description: The IATA code of the city or airport to which the traveler may go, from the provided origin

searches.description: Average number of daily searches for the destination during the search period provided

searches_prior_year.description: Prior year average number of daily searches for the destination during the search period provided

date.description: The search date provided in the input.

origin_station_id.description: Station ID of the origin station for this search.

services.description: Array to describe service to the destinations.

trains.description: The array of trains that will be required to complete the given itinerary. Since the cache currently only contains direct itineraries, there will be only one object in this array.

accomodation.description: A standard enumeration of the mode in which the passenger is accommodated. For example: SEAT, BERTH, CABIN, CARGO, UNKNOWN.

booking_code.description: A code the identifies the type of booking class being used.

rate.description: A rate identifying type of charge being levied for this service, and the restrictions that apply.

service_class.description: A standard enumeration of the type of seat, bed or service the passenger can expect.

total_price.description: The total cost of this service.

arrival_station.description: The station object representing the station at which the passenger should disembark this train in order to complete this part of the itinerary.

arrives_at.description: The ISO 8601 date-time of the train's arrival in the local time zone of the arrival station, in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm.

departs_at.description: The ISO 8601 date-time of the train's departure in the local time zone of the departure station, in the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm.

departure_station.description: The station object representing the station at which the passenger should board this train in order to complete this part of the itinerary.

marketing_company.description: The name of the train company selling this train journey. This is the name you should see printed on your ticket.

operating_company.description: The name of the train company operating this train journey. This is the name you should see written on the train.

prices.description: Possible pricing for this train journey.

train_number.description: The identifying number of this train service. Usually the marketing company will only operate on train per day with this train number.

train_type.description: The type of train that you may expect for this journey. For example: InterCity, Regional...

creation_office_id.description: 9 character Amadeus office identifier of the travel agency that created this travel record. An office ID may be considered as equivalent to a PCC in other reservation systems.

owner_office_id.description: 9 character Amadeus office identifier of the travel agency that owns and manages this travel record.

header.description: Summarized metadata on the record that has been retrieved.

messages.description: Functional or technical messages associated with the retrieval of this travel record.

record_locator.description: 6 character identifier of this travel record on the Amadeus system.

reservation.description: Details about the itineraries that have been reserved as part of this travel record.

travelers.description: Information about each traveler who may be included as part of this travel record.

contacts.description: Details on how to contact this traveler. At least one traveler in a travel-record will have a contact element.

date_of_birth.description: An ISO 8601 date indicating the birth date of the traveler, as provided by the agent. For example: 1972-02-19.

first_name.description: The first name of the passenger, as entered by the agent, in upper-case. May include middle names, initials or prefixes. The total combined length of the first name and last name must be between 2 and 57 characters. For example: ALEXANDRA, JOSE-ANTONIO MR, ELAINE T DR.

frequent_traveler_cards.description: Information regarding loyalty cards that the traveler would like to use to accrue benefits as part of this travel record. Where possible, the system will attempt to validate that the frequent traveler card is eligible for use in the context of this travel record.

id.description: Uniquely identifies this traveler in this travel record. This ID is persistent, and remains the same for the lifetime of the travel record.

infant.description: Details on any infant that may be sharing this seat with this traveler. Absence of this key indicates that no infant is traveling with this passenger. An empty object at this key indicated an anonymous infant is traveling with the passenger.

last_name.description: The last name of the passenger, as entered by the agent, in upper-case. May include suffixes. For example: THACKSTON, KING III, LU.

traveler_type.description: Enumeration of the type of traveler. May be ADULT or CHILD.

estimated_total.description: The estimated total cost of the rental given the rental period and location provided, including all mandatory taxes and charges, and using a default set of rental options and restrictions defined by the car company.

images.description: An image to give an indication of what to expect when renting this vehicle.

rates.description: Rates that will be applied during the duration of the car rental requested. These rates are generally not inclusive of tax and are used by the car rental company to compute the total cost at the end of the rental period.

vehicle_info.description: More information about the type of vehicle on offer.

acriss_code.description: The 4 letter ACRISS code that defines the properties of vehicle being rented.

air_conditioning.description: The decoded ACRISS air_conditioning information, to let you know if this vehicle has air conditioning

category.description: The decoded ACRISS vehicle category (For example: Economy, Luxury, Standard).

fuel.description: The decoded ACRISS fuel type, to let you know if this vehicle is hybrid, electric, etc.

transmission.description: The decoded ACRISS transmission type, to let you know if this vehicle is Automatic or Manual Transmission (stick-shift).

type.description: The decoded ACRISS vehicle type, to let you know what kind of vehicle this is (For example: Van, SUV, Pickup).
